doc.title: Txt B4 Marriage
doc.plot: Would you marry someone you've never met? This is the story of Noel, a simple guy living in the small provincial town of Santo Angel in the Philippines. He is about to get married to Liza, a Filipina working as a caregiver in Hereford,England . They were introduced by text, dated by text, argued by text and he proposed by text. Complications arise
